snippet: Gov. Rick Perry has a history of never losing an election and never quitting. Even dealing with a setback, like his defeat in Iowa, is virgin territory for him.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Perry has a history of never losing an election and never quitting. Even dealing with a setback, like his defeat in Iowa, is virgin territory for him.

headline.seo: Rick Perry May Still Be in the Presidential Race, Even After His Iowa Defeat
headline.main: The Man Has Never Lost an Election, and Bowing Out Now Is Not an Option
headline.print_headline: The Man Has Never Lost an Election, and Bowing Out Now Is Not an Option
